text: Maria Contreras-Sweet (born 1955) is a Mexican-American businesswoman and politician. She was the 24th Administrator of the Small Business Administration from 2014 to 2017. On January 15, 2014, she was nominated by President Barack Obama to join his Cabinet as head of the Small Business Administration. She was confirmed as the Administrator of the Small Business Administration by voice vote on March 27, 2014. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Administrators of the Small Business Administration Category:Mexican businesspeople Category:Businesspeople from California Category:Politicians from California Category:People from Guadalajara Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States
title: Maria Contreras-Sweet
